I just posted a call for all moviemakers here:
http://groups.yahoo.com/grou=
p/SHQ_Spy_Division/message/845

and ask all fans to consider submitting an =
mp3 where they answer the 
question
"Why do you like the Shinsengumi?"

the=
 file can be sent using megaupload or yousendit to my email 
secretarytocap=
t3(at)hotmail.com

and you should include a pen name

I want to compile all=
 these answers into one audio file and mix it 
with other multimedia...ther=
e is no deadline because I can 
continuously add more and more mp3 files to=
gether.

All you need is a microphone and a basic soundrecorder (if you can=
 
record as .wav that's fine I can convert it into mp3).

In other words th=
is will be a massive audio tagboard.

One of the issues with the internet f=
or many is it usually lacks  
real human contact (traditional concepts of h=
uman contact, face to 
face, audio or visual)---but ofcourse technology is =
gradually 
changing that.  What's clear to me from just the number of visit=
ors 
to SHQ is that we have people who want to read and learn about the 
gr=
oup from ALL OVER THE WORLD and it would neat to hear from some 
friends we=
've never met before.  So your message can be in any 
language (as long as =
you submit a translation, that way I can put up 
a slide in English and we =
can read it).

I think that anywhere from one sentence to a 5 minute commen=
t is fair 
because the goal is to capture the variety of reasons people hav=
e for 
having an interest in the Shinsengumi.

So I hope to get a couple of=
 responses (^_^)

I know you all are out there...and we well eternally need=
 your help 
in making the site better and better.  So by contributing your =
voice 
you are encouraging some of our researchers to keep up their work an=
d 
keep sharing it with the world.
